response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. It is valued at $1,200,000 to you, and I understand its immense worth to your business. I am extending this offer to you at a special price of $1,100,000, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1100000}
